Name: Battle for borders
About the game: A game about military weapons. At the moment it is a single player game with bots in tank battles. In the future, it is planned to add other various types of vehicles and weapons, as well as multiplayer. By adding details from containers for game currency earned in battles, the player collects a collection of military vehicles. Mechanics are made in the game: types of tank armor protection (steel, combined and dynamic), types of tank ammunition (armor-piercing, cumulative, high-explosive, ATGM and smoke), the possibility of shooting and controlling a machine gun, the behavior of the tank suspension, partial destruction of the tank. Destruction of surrounding objects and different weather conditions at combat locations. Each MBT has the indicators, sights and shells of the originals.
